title: The Hero Who Returned Remains the Strongest in the Modern World - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Ecchi   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   School Life   Shounen
tags: Adapted to Manga   Bullying   Complex Family Relationships   Dense Protagonist   Evil Gods   Exorcism   Fantasy World   Former Hero   Harem-seeking Protagonist   Loli   Magic   Male Protagonist   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   Monsters   Organized Crime   Overpowered Protagonist   Polygamy   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Quirky Characters   R-15   Returning from Another World   Secret Identity   Secret Organizations   Summoned Hero   Yandere
author: Shiraishi Arata   白石新
description:
Daiki Morishita, who transferred to another world and became a hero, came back to Japan, defeating the demon king.

However, in fact, in the dark society of Japan, the (in this case rare) world of battle-like battles was expanding.

This is a story that uses status and skills in modern Japan, and the heroes returning from other worlds apply power leveling to incompetent classmates.>
